channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP STAGING – Backup Duplicator & Migration
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP STAGING – Backup Duplicator & Migration

item.title: CVE-2022-2737|2024-08-03T00:46:04.156Z -- unknown -- wp%20staging%20%E2%80%93%20backup%20duplicator%20%26%20migration
item.description: The WP STAGING WordPress plugin before 2.9.18 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
